qas.question: In what year did Capello resign as England's football manager?
Capello resigned as England's football manager after a dispute over removing which player from team captaincy?
Who became the new manager of England's football team in May of 2012?
In which round of UEFA Euro 2012 was England eliminated?
A defeat by which team ultimately eliminated England from UEFA Euro 2012?
In what year was Capello made England's manager?
what country hosted the UEFA Euro 2012?
Who was the manager of Italy's team in 2012?
In what year did John Terry become captain of England's team?

context: In February <a0_0><b5_0><b8_0>2012<b8_0/><b5_0/><a0_0/>, Capello resigned from his role as England manager, following a disagreement with the FA over their request to remove <a1_0><b7_0>John Terry<b7_0/><a1_0/> from team captaincy after accusations of racial abuse concerning the player. Following this, there was media speculation that Harry Redknapp would take the job. However, on 1 May 2012, <a2_0>Roy Hodgson<a2_0/> was announced as the new manager, just six weeks before UEFA Euro 2012. England managed to finish top of their group, winning two and drawing one of their fixtures, but exited the Championships in <a3_0>the quarter-finals<a3_0/> via a penalty shoot-out, this time to <a4_0><b6_0><b9_0>Italy<b9_0/><b6_0/><a4_0/>.
